actionConfiguration.body:
SELECT cc.period Period, pca.id, cc.geo_region_id,   pct.vehicle_ids Vehicles, pco."type", 
pco.commission_fraction as Commission ,pco.min_kms as Min_Kms, pco.incv_km_cap as INCV_KM_CAP, pco.per_km_rate as PER_KM_RATE
FROM vp.payout_campaigns pca
INNER JOIN vp.payout_configs pco ON pco.payout_campaign_id = pca.id
INNER JOIN vp.payout_campaign_targets pct ON pct.payout_campaign_id = pca.id
INNER JOIN vp.payout_cam_cam_config_joins pj ON pj.payout_campaign_id = pca.id
INNER JOIN vp.campaign_configs cc ON pj.campaign_config_id = cc.id
where cc.period @> (SELECT CURRENT_DATE + 1)
order by pco.updated_at desc;
